post.body: Next to the Cadbury factory. Its on the second floor of Satkar Residency
The Twitter connect, helps the user latch on to the vibe that the topic commands amongst all and sundry. Well done, Kosmix.
Socially powered search engines are here to stay. Malleability and ductility are quintessential traits.
Game Theory suggests that possible solutions lie more often in the intent behind the question and not in the question itself.
X is jst 0.5% of Y.Bt it favrbly chnges me frm ‘to be scrutinized’ 2 ‘Wow,what a catch!’Insurnce amzes me.It’s nice 2 hve an insder connect.
Satyam has won the Golden Peacock Global Award for Excellence in Corporate Governance for 2008 - ha! raju's back in his shell!
Err: Leaner times ahead - pun unintentional
a 50% ADR drop as it opened. Satyam-Maytas...fall swoop anybody?
Why!?!Dont we all know!extraneous--tat was d word.So be it.Shine on.Syd! (couldnt help but mention the man,inspite of the disconnect)
Sigh! :( It was good while it lasted... it'll be that much better when I get it back.
To both the marwari brothers: happy Birthday!
Correctio and clarity: MM/DD/YYYY or DD/MM/YYYY.... !!! Accounts...you dim wits !
MM/DD/YYYY or DD/MM/YYYY.... !!! :-O you dim wit!
Phugf! Worrisome tasks due... smooth sailing cut short! :(
Lsn 39878962:Flnging any kind of footwear,is consdred 'insulting' 2 say d least, in EVRY cltre.No ambiguity in d sntiment bhind this gsture.
A journo hurled a shoe at Bush,while he addressed in Iraq.CNN reprted tat d throwing of shoes is consdred highly insulting in Iraqi culture
A $100 notebook...however packaged within is a $60/month, AT&T tie up. Culminating in the $400 notebook costing $ 1540 in two years. Darn!
Why is every seemingly 'good deal' woven in a Matryoshka structure? For the second time this august morning, be aware!
Madoff Investment Securities and the USD 50 mil that vanished. A classic case of 'Suspension of Disbelief'. Smell the coffee people! Beware
I discovered that you could bargain at Vijay Sales. A 1500 discount on exchange is too little, how about 2000? Okie he said! :-O
Observation: Work Shrinks Time. Murphy's commentary on the fore mentioned - - - Coming Soon.
Obsrvtn:Wrk Shrnks Tme!Wnder if Mrphy mntned this,else, I’ll label this as Sunil's postulate of ‘Space-Time and subsequent Energy continuum’
Weekend Weekend Weekend!!! This was one short week... The clock did its routine at breakneck speed. Shukriya :)
Pay to pray! How about using the 8% surcharge for someting more constructive... like clearing the national debt.
Hah!!! That was a very constructive and candid meeting. Glad BR is not the man-eater i suspected!
Person @ work who doubles as LIC agent...almost JUMPED outa his seat on hearing a query of mine. Trust I am gonna get pestered now. Darn!
Discovred new restrnt in Thane. Palates. Not bad at all.:) Though i suspct we almst got an attendnt fired.Lemon vodka cake - a first timer.
The 'No Spinning' rule in Foosball makes the game a lot more fun. Please abide by it. The game is kinda addictive :)
Kemps Corner quite contrary to its mrkt price has a lions share of the most derelict buildings in Bombay. Not a pleasant sight.
What i found out today:There is a synagogue close to my office! It is cald The Tiphaereth Israel Synagogue - belongs to the Bene Israel comm
Peple @ wrk discussing how their respective Omegas, speed up by 2 mins every week. WTF! Inspite of the price tag, it doesnt do its job rite?
What I found out today (amongst other things :) ) - Luthier: builder of acoustic instruments... thanks again, jared
Shape the game you play..Dont simply go hopping towards the next game you find. Works for the structured as well as the free wheeling kinds
Socially powered search engines are here to stay. Malleability and ductility are quintessential traits. Using Tweets is a good step, kosmix.
Watched High School Musical III ! Its simplicity is verrry applealing. Bubbles enjoyed it too! And Red Box serves Yummmay! food.
At the cost of getting repetitive,mCheck is so convenient.It shd be made availble by all service providers.For once i am glad i use Airtel!
It is so simple.. two numbers x and y... that all i need. Thats easier said that done although! Published data.... but published where?
Why do we use lakhs... why does the world not follow the norm of using either Lakhs or Millions.. Why Why! Grrr!
sunildrajan Its that time of the day, when i can only see Grids. Its framed vision...Literally.
